synopsis: In episode #8 of the podcast, Devam and Ahir welcome Ganesh Ramakrishnan for a candid discussion on motivation, mental health, and the challenges of navigating life's pressures. The trio dives deep into personal experiences, exploring the importance of self-compassion, the journey of finding one's path, and the power of connection in overcoming anxiety.
quotes: Sometimes, the most profound journey is the one we take within ourselves.
Procrastination is not a sign of laziness; it's often an emotional regulation issue.
Wiggle your toe. Sometimes, all it takes is a small step to get moving.
Your inner voice should be your greatest ally, not your harshest critic.
It's okay to take a pause; sometimes, your body just needs the rest.
When everything feels overwhelming, remember: you are not alone in this struggle.
Make new friends and explore new interests; you never know where they might lead you.
Trust the process and be kind to yourself; every small win counts.
You don't have to have all the answers right now; just take it one step at a time.
Even in the darkest times, reaching out can shine a light on your path.
